system.effect: Character can spend a Fate Point to adopt a Stalwart Defence as a Full Action. Whilst in this condition, character cannot move or dodge, however they may make the Parry Reaction against all strikes against them, and they suffer -2 damage. Additionally, enemies gain no bonus from outnumbering the character in close combat. These effects last until the character chooses to end the effect, or is rendered incapable of fighting.
